div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Flag` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Flag`. Element `Flag` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.identifier`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.status` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.status`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.category` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.category`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.code`, but has no comparisons.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.subject`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Flag.subject` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Flag.subject` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.subject`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.period` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.period`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.encounter` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.encounter`, but has no comparisons.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Flag.author` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Flag.author` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.author`, but has no comparisons.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

comment.value: FHIR R5 Resource `Flag` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Flag`. Element `Flag` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.identifier`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.status` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.status`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.category` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.category`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.code`, but has no comparisons.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.subject`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Flag.subject` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Flag.subject` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.subject`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.period` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.period`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Flag.encounter` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.encounter`, but has no comparisons.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Flag.author` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Flag.author` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.author`, but has no comparisons.
